body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jerry Diaz and the customer's name is Amanda Green.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jerry Diaz, and I’m with MetaCar, your trusted car rental agency. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Jerry. I’m Amanda Green, and I’m feeling a bit frustrated with my recent rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Amanda. I’m here to help. Can you tell me what specifically is troubling you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, the car I rented was not in the condition I expected when I picked it up.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how disappointing that can be. Can you please provide me with the rental confirmation number? It usually consists of six digits.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Now, may I also have your phone number for our records? Please spell out the digits.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Definitely! It’s one two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks, Amanda. I appreciate your patience. I’ll look into this issue immediately.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jerry. I hope this gets resolved quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! I’ll keep you updated. Thank you for your time today, Amanda, and have a great day!
